  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      protected Card(CardSide frontSide, CardSide backSide, boolean isFrontFacing, int id, int x, int y)
      Class Constructors
      Parameters:
      frontSide - group of Corners that make the front Side of the card
      backSide - group of empty Corners that make the back Side of the card, plus other features like permanent resources
      isFrontFacing - true if the Card is showing the front Side, false if it is showing the back Side
      id - unique identifier for the specific Card
      x - horizontal coordinate for the Card's position on the table (null if not placed)
      y - vertical coordinate for the Card's position on the table (null if not placed)

    • Card

      public Card(CardSide frontSide, CardSide backSide, boolean isFrontFacing, int id)
      Class Constructor without the x and y parameters, to generate Cards without having to place them already
      Parameters:
      frontSide - group of Corners that make the front Side of the card
      backSide - group of empty Corners that make the back Side of the card, plus other features like permanent resources
      isFrontFacing - true if the Card is showing the front Side, false if it is showing the back Side
      id - unique identifier for the specific Card

    • flip

      public void flip()
      Flips the Card, changing which Side it is showing. Inverts the value inside isFrontFacing.
